title: Re evaluation results are out ?
content: I want to now when they release the re evaluation results or it is already out for engineering 2nd year

comments.body:
Bruh they're already out
Check website and if it says final results, reval is out
I spoke to coe office in ec campus and they told me that the re-eval results have not been updated yet for 2nd yrs
Not sure, didn't ask about that
Are the grades being shown in final results for you ?
Yes but generally we get that remark saying whether the grade has changed or not. That hasn't shown up yet.

Yeah you are right ! Revaluation results shows up like No change or Grade changed from A to S kinda thing. But they keep changing stuff like emailing scholarship and no list and all that so was confused
Have they sent the mail already for scholarships?
